name: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e

quotes.show: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e
quotes.quote: All people are nothing but tools. It doesn't matter how it's done. It doesn't matter what needs to be sacrificed. In this world, winning is everything. As long as I win in the end...That's all that matters.
